Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Christen J. Reimer "GAME SONIC"
Reviews.Content: Great phone, must buy!!!  If your looking for a prepaid this is a great phone! Cool design with it too!

Reviews.Title: great phone for hubby
Reviews.Author: lew
Reviews.Content: My husband is not very gifted with the new technology in phones. This is one that he has used for the past two years and that is why I bought him another one just like it.  Very easy for him to use and is perfect for someone that just uses their cell to talk and do a little texting.

Reviews.Title: SUPERB with SIMPLICITY!
Reviews.Author: woods
Reviews.Content: A really great compact & little phone with excellent quality,design,graphics,sound,& features.. Especially unlocked it is VERY versatile & world-wide usage as a GSM QUAD-BAND!

Reviews.Title: poor product
Reviews.Author: r
Reviews.Content: This was one piece of crap sold to me..this character who sold this item should be barred from selling anything for life over and over.

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: whitney vigil
Reviews.Content: it is good if you just want to call and text but other than that it is really bad the video and picture is really poor quality if some one sends you a detailed picture message you only get half of it im with tmobile but sometimes the phone itself says it has no service its good for a kids first phone

ProductInfo.Features:
Vital Statistics..The Samsung T249 weighs 3.2 ounces and measures 3.9 x 1.9 x 0.6 inches. Its 800 mAh lithium-ion battery is rated at up to 4.5 hours of talk time, and up to 312 hours (13 days) of standby time. It runs on the 850/900/1800/1900 MHz GSM/GPRS/EDGE frequencies.
Package Includes: SAMSUNG T249 BLUE T-MOBILE GSM UNLOCKED,ORIGINAL BATTERY,ORIGINAL BATTERY DOOR,USER GUIDE,ORIGINAL CHARGER,RETAIL BOX.
Slide yourself into something new with the affordable Samsung T249 for T-Mobile, which features a cool slider design, 1.3-megapixel camera, and Bluetooth connectivity for hands-free devices and stereo music streaming to optional Bluetooth-enabled headphones. It sits slimly in your pocket when you're out and about, and the face slide smoothly up to reveal the keypad when you want to make a call.
Color LCD screen with 176 x 220-pixel resolution and 65K color depth,Standard alpha-numeric keypad hidden under sliding face,1.3-megapixel camera with multi-shot mode, enabling you to take multiple shots in quick succession and save only the ones you want to keep,,Video capture capabilities up to 176 x 143 pixels at 15 fps (frames per second),Multi-format digital media player compatible with MP3 and AAC music formats and MPEG4, H.264, H.263, WMV, and 3GP video formats,Bluetooth connectivity (version 2.0) includes profiles for communication headset, hands-free car kits, and the A2DP Bluetooth profile--enabling you to wirelessly stream your music to a pair of compatible Bluetooth stereo headphones or speaker dock,•Memory expansion via microSD card slot with support for optional cards up to 16 GB.,100 MB internal memory,Text (SMS) and picture/video (MMS) messaging,Audio Postcard feature allows you to add a personalized message to a photo before sending it to friends and family using multimedia messaging (MMS),Access to popular instant messaging services such as AOL, Yahoo!, and Windows Live.,Organizer tools including calendar, alarm clock, tasks, memo, calculator, tip calculator, world time, unit converter, timer, and stopwatch,Airplane mode allows you to listen to music while the cellular connectivity is turned off.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung T249 Blue T-mobile Gsm Unlocked,Works with: T-Mobile, AT&T, H20, SimpleMobile, Airvoice Etc
